results.title: Influence of simvastatin on hepatocytes - histopathological and immunohistochemical study.
results.text_hl: Summing up the results, it can be concluded that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ caused @DISEASE_Chemical_and_Drug_Induced_Liver_Injury @DISEASE_MESH:D056486 @@@liver damage@@@ with similar morphological changes seen in @<m>DISEASE_Autoimmune_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001327 @@@autoimmune@@@-like @DISEASE_Liver_Failure @DISEASE_MESH:D017093 @@@liver injury@@@, which may indicate that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ may induce @<m>DISEASE_Autoimmune_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001327 @@@autoimmune@@@-like drug induced @DISEASE_Liver_Failure @DISEASE_MESH:D017093 @@@liver injury@@@.
